Student Loan Hero (https://studentloanhero.com) - New York, NY / Santiago, Chile - Full time

We're on a mission to help 42 million Americans manage their student loans smarter. Student Loan Hero is an unbiased solution to organize, manage, and repay your student loans.

We're looking for an excellent front-end developer (JavaScript, CoffeeScript, AngularJS, CSS/HTML5 and familiarity with Ruby On Rails), it will be great if you have some financial background. We're a small team and you'll have a large impact on company culture.

Email paul@studentloanhero.com to apply.
